\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\Gamma.A} \\
	\\
	\\
	\Gamma && {\Gamma.A} && {\Gamma.A.A[p_{A}]}
	\arrow["{p_{A}}", from=4-3, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{p_{A[p_{A}]}}", from=4-5, to=4-3]
	\arrow["{p_{A}}"', from=1-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow["{(p_{A} \circ p_{A[p_{A}]}, q_{A[p_{A}]})}"', dashed, from=4-5, to=1-1]
\end{tikzcd}\]
